resources.string: The Rick and Morty Quiz App
About Rick and Morty

The show revolves around the adventures of the members of the Smith household, which consists of parents Jerry and Beth, their children Summer and Morty, and Beth s father, Rick Sanchez, who lives with them as a guest. According to Justin Roiland, the family lives outside of Seattle, Washington. The adventures of Rick and Morty, however, take place across an infinite number of realities, with the characters travelling to other planets and dimensions through portals and Rick s flying car. Rick is an eccentric and alcoholic mad scientist, who eschews many ordinary conventions such as school, marriage, love, and family. He frequently goes on adventures with his 14 year old grandson, Morty, a kind hearted but easily distressed boy, whose naive but grounded moral compass plays counterpoint to Rick s Machiavellian ego. Morty s 17 year old sister, Summer, is a more conventional teenager who worries about improving her status among her peers and sometimes follows Rick and Morty on their adventures. The kids mother, Beth, is a generally level headed person and assertive force in the household, though self conscious about her professional role as a horse surgeon. She is dissatisfied with her marriage to Jerry, a simple minded and insecure person, who disapproves of Rick s influence over his family.
The Rick & Morty That The Show Follows Are Originally From Dimension C-173
Jerry\'s Station Wagon Is Based On The Car From National Lampoon\'s Vacation?
Rick & Morty Have Appeared In The Opening Title Screen Of The Simpsons?
Jaguar From \'Pickle Rick\' Had His Own Spin Off Show With Adult Swim?
Two Brothers\' Is The First Show Rick & Morty Watch On Inter-Dimensional Cable?
According To Dan Harmon, A Schmeckle Is Worth $148?
The Bloomflark Is The Universal Currency For The Galactic Federation?
When Bird-Person Is \'Reborn\' He Is Dubbed Phoenix-Bird?
Doctor Neon Bloom Runs Anatomy Park?
When Snuffles Is Able To Talk, He Changes His Name To Snowball?
"Wubba Lubba Dub Dub" Means \'Let\'s Party\'?
Leading Up To The First Episode, Rick Had Left Beth And The Family For 10 Year
In \'Total Rickall\', The Only Character That Isn\'t A Parasite Is Pencilvester?
Tammy Killed Bird-Person On Their Wedding Day?
When Being Scammed By The Zigereons, Rick\'s Safe Code Is \'1-3-5-3\'?
Ice-T\'s Real Name On Alphabetrium Was H2O-T?
When Jerry & Beth Split Up, Jerry Enters A Relationship With A Krootabulan?
The Episode \'Something Ricked This Way\' Is A Parody Of An Edgar Allen Poe Poem
Rick\'s Hivemind Ex-Lover Is Called Purity?
The Conjoint Twin That Simultaneously Host The News &v A Cooking Show Are Calle Michael & Pichael?
